name: Docchi Mecha!
overview: Docchi Mecha! is a strategy game in which the player take the role of a little alien that have to pass some missions to reach his objectives. The game uses a cartoon 3d engine for the battle ground and 2d anime sequences for the adventure part. The gameplay is about creating little aliens (and bigger ones) to grab items, create new buildings and attack the enemies buildings and unit. The mission is complete when you destroy the enemy. The game features different camera angles and beautiful light effects.
